website_summaries.verdict: Light to moderate coverage foundation that uses blur the look of imperfections for a flawless natural finish.
pros: Provides you with broad spectrum SPF 15 coverage
A little goes a long way
cons: The consistency may be a bit watery for some

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a knock off
customer_reviews.text: So this is definitely not an original hello happy foundation, the price gives that away but I ordered it anyways. The only noticeable difference is the packaging and the labeling, the formula goes on great, blends seamlessly, holds for all day wear and really no other complaints. Photo on the left is what I received and the photo on the right is the original product purchased for $30 at ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews saying this is a knock off because of packaging be slightly different but to me it’s the same. I don’t see any difference in the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was the real brand and it really is by the manufacture. It was my first time using this brand so I was surprised with how light weight it feels on your face and how easily it blends. I like a litttle move coverage so I add extra to get my desired coverage. worth spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage, feels and smells great, and a little goes a long way. I was looking for a new “blur” foundation when my old favorite was discontinued. This one is far better than the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Banwart

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this foundation. I have been using a lot of Benefits Cosmetics products and this product was just as good as the rest of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Best price anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Best price on this foundation! I love it, super light weight and you only need a bit! This bottle easily lasts me 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: SMartin

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation. It’s perfect color and buildable if you want more Coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite Benefit products. It's very buildable but light on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herbst

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put on. Doesn't feel greasy, lasts all day!!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Townsend III

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this foundation! Looks perfect and feels so light weight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hello Happy Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchased this product at Sephora, but they didn't have my color. I was able to get two on sale through Amazon. Happy girl!
customer_reviews.author: Ted Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’m never changing my foundation again. Literally so skin like and perfect. In love with it , thank youuu
customer_reviews.author: Denisa Melniciuc

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this often and love it it's a perfect match for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to live for full coverage foundations but entering my 30s I have upped my skin care game. I’m now really happy with my skin so heavy, thick foundation feels so suffocating. It’s also getting really hot here now in south Florida. This feels like a cc cream and gets rid of redness and small imperfections but isn't oily. It dries so nice I don’t even need to set it with drying powders. So natural looking. It’s nearly $30 in beauty stores but has been reasonably priced here so I’m stocking up while I can. My holy grain item.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky about my foundation. It needs to cover without overdoing it, blend well, not smell perfumy, last, and has to let my skin breathe. This foundation does it all. I didn’t pay as much as the average department store make-up, not sure how this product is distributed to get the lower cost. However it happens, the product itself is impressive. I have bought and tossed a lot of foundation, this one is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: De'Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: First time using this foundation and I love it! It gave me a flawless finish and didn't look cakey. It is sheer so you need to add more for full coverage. The price was good and it shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: In light Complicated so #3 works great for me. I have a little redness in my face and it helps cover it up with still feeling light and not caked on.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Happy soft Blur Foundation
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this foundation i saw it in a utube video and sent for it its lightweight and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Deena Ensworth

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: No difference between what I bought at Ulta/Sephora and this one
customer_reviews.author: Nickykens

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The pkg was ok on the outside, but had some spill on plastic and as the pic shows makeup was on our side of bottle and a needs on inside of cap. I will have to clean it up and use it. I don’t have time to return and get new one. Not happy with the shipping packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Lee Kay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic foundation but broken!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with the cap off and 1/3 of the foundation all over the box. I salvaged what I could.
customer_reviews.author: ctrack72

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel
customer_reviews.text: Not very full coverage but it looks nice on and doesn’t look cakey. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Axlen

product_meta.title: Benefit Cosmetics Hello Happy Soft Blur Foundation Shade 3
product_meta.description: No, you don’t need to check your glasses prescription, it’s the effect of Benefit’s Hello Happy Soft Blur Foundation. Its lightweight formula is packed with soft focus optical blurring spheres
feature_bullets: A light-to-medium coverage liquid foundation with broad-spectrum SPF 15 sun protection.
Skin type : Sensitive, Normal, Dry, Combination, Oily
In terms of item color, it may be slightly different from each monitor display and specification.
